name: Anonymous
review: It was so good experience. Condition of hired vehicle was very good. Pricing is absolutely reasonable even in peak season time. The owner Mr Rajesh (Raju bhai) is very gentle and polite person.
owner_reply: Thankyou sir we are always happy to help you

name: Vaibhav Gala
review: Best service in Gandhidham and all over Kutch, well maintained car, genuine and reliable people 👍

name: Gopal Joshi
review: Excellent Self Drive Car Rental Service in Kutch. If you are coming to Bhuj or Gandhidham and are planning to travel Rann of Kutch, Kalo Dungar, Vijay Vilas Palace, Dholavira, Road to Heaven, I highly recommend you to book a car from them. They have good, clean, functional, high quality sedan cars available for self drive hire.
owner_reply: Thankyou and you have always welcome

name: Sweta Tanna
review: The experience was very good. Had a very smooth service. Definitely trustworthy. Amazing condition of car and unbelievable hospitality at such good rates. I will suggest everybody to get their services, really loved it 👍

name: Jigar Gogri
review: Great service by Raju bhai and Krunal bhai. Got a well maintained car at a highly competitive price! Pickup drop service from Gandhidham Railway station. Highly recommend for self drive cars in Kutch!
owner_reply: Thanks Jigar bhai you have always welcome from us

name: Kaushal Vedant
review: The best car rental service available for self drive in Kutch. Always helpful and cool nature of Raju Bhai makes the experience wonderful. Thank you very much Gurukrupa Travels and Raju Bhai. Wish you all the best 👍👍

name: Mayank Raiyani
review: I had hired a car for White Desert from Gandhidham Railway Station and it was a superb experience with Gurukrupa Travels cars and driver. The owner helped us a lot in planning our tour with special spots and dinner at White Desert. Thanks Gurukrupa Travels for making my journey memorable and joyful once again.
owner_reply: Thanks we are always happy to help you, welcome and visit again

name: Varun Talati
review: I had a great experience with Rajesh bhai and Krunal bhai. I rented a self-drive car for a day. They had options for self-drive and with driver as well. The car was in excellent condition, and the owner was very helpful for the trip. The whole rental process was smooth and easy. Highly recommend!
owner_reply: Thankyou sir we are always happy to help you, welcome and visit again

name: Munaf Popatia
review: Very good service. No hidden charges. Very good nature.

name: Mayank Shah
review: I am really very thankful to Kunal bhai who was in constant touch with us during the tour. Lakhan bhai as a driver was very cooperative & I will highly recommend to be a part of Gurukrupa tour.

name: Raj Patel
review: Best car service provider in city. Always on time.

name: Rahul Shah
review: Rajubhai and his son Krunal are truly wonderful, humble and very cooperative people. Their services are up to the mark with professional approach and 100% customer satisfaction commitments. One of the best travel agencies with years of experience and well maintained fleet of cars 👍👍👍
owner_reply: You have always welcome sir. Thankyou 🙏🙏🙏

name: Minoo Shah
review: I used their car in Kutch for temple visits. It was a lovely experience and Shri Raju Sir is so lively and full of historical details of places, their importance, and very polite and warm. Highly recommend.
owner_reply: Thankyou mem. Our car has become holy thanks to the steps of people like you 🙏🙏🙏

name: Salim Sayani
review: Best service in city, good behaviour staff and well maintained cars. Thank you Rajesh Sir. I'll visit again. 😊
